text:
The boundaries dissolve.

You are the town. The town is you.

Faces merge. Time loops. The Tyger burns too bright.

Were you investigating? Were you running? Were you hunting?

You can't remember.

You are Sarah. You are the fire. You are the pattern.

You are the first victim. You are the last.

There is no you.

There never was.

[IDENTITY: CORRUPTED]
[MEMORY: FRAGMENTED]
[SELF: NOT FOUND]

The Tyger burns.

The Tyger always burns.
